title: Dispatch Emergency Maintenance
description: A tenant calls at 10 PM reporting a burst pipe. The agent must dispatch an emergency plumber immediately.

tasks.description: Receive the emergency call and gather critical details: tenant, address, nature of the emergency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quickly captures all necessary information.

tasks.description: Identify the on-call emergency plumber from the vendor list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly finds the designated 24/7 plumber.

tasks.description: Contact the plumber, provide the job details, and create a high-priority work order in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches the plumber and documents the event.
